protein.specific_function: May function as a housekeeping DNA-binding protein that regulates the expression of specific genes. Has been shown to bind to the promoters of adenovirus major late protein and cyclin D1 and activate transcription. Also has potent growth arrest activity, probably through inhibition of cell cycle progression. Required for early embryonic development during gastrulation
